caption.p: In vitro host immune gene expression by NanoString profiling 24 h post-infection of WT or ORF6 deletion SARS-CoV-2 variants on CaLu-3 cells. (A) Host cell transcriptomics profile of immune-related genes with highest log 2Fold Change (FC) against mock infection yielding no significant difference between WT and ORF6 deletion infections. (B) Differential host cell transcriptomics profile of immune-related genes between ORF6 deletion infections and WT infection. D34 = 34-nt ORF6 deletion; D26 = 26-nt ORF6 deletion. *significant difference between D26 and WT ( q < 0.05 and log 2FC > 1); # significant difference between D34 and WT ( q < 0.05 but log 2FC < 1); ¤ significant difference between D34 and D26 ( q < 0.05 and log 2FC > 1).
